LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_CoherenceSpot.label: coherence spot
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_CoherenceSpot.descri: Designates a spot for coherence. Synstructs will prefer to build coherence here, and can be assigned to specific pawns.
Designates a spot for coherence. Synstructs will prefer to build coherence here, and can be assigned to specific pawns.
